rules_text:
When this creature enters, create a Treasure token.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or enchantment, this creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
notes:
!tokens Treasure EIW;
An explosive deck that builds out a board of trinkety artifacts and enchantments, then sacrifices them for a burst of damage.
